info.title: EnvoyOU Core API
info.description: Early skeleton of the EnvoyOU public API specification. This is a draft and will evolve. Endpoints and schemas are incomplete.

post.summary: Compute peer benchmark for supplied company IDs
Run scenario analysis over a portfolio or company set

RateLimitLimit.description: The quota ceiling for the current window.

RateLimitRemaining.description: Requests remaining in the current window.

RateLimitReset.description: Unix epoch seconds when the current window resets.

RequestID.description: Unique ID for tracing this request.

PaginationNext.description: Cursor token for the next page (omit if no further pages).

message.example: One or more fields failed validation

example.message: One or more fields failed validation

X-RateLimit-Retry-After.description: Seconds until requests are accepted again.
